scripts.clean!: npm run reset && npm run clean
scripts.clean!!: npm run reset! && npm run clean
scripts.ds_store: find . -iname "*.DS_Store" -exec git rm {} \;; find . -iname "*er i konflikt*" -exec git rm {} \;; find . -iname "*.DS_Store" -exec rm {} \;; find . -iname "index.docx" -exec rm {} \;; find . -iname "*.log" -exec rm {} \;
scripts.rebuild: npm run build && npm run browser && npm run build
scripts.browser: browserify resources/lib/index.js -o resources/js/markdown-template.js && browserify resources/test/index.js -o resources/test/test.js && npm run lint
scripts.start: npm run open && npm run server
scripts.test: npm run spec && npm run lint
scripts.lint: jshint resources/lib/anchor.js resources/lib/build.js resources/lib/collapse.js resources/lib/markdown.js resources/lib/compile.js resources/lib/figure.js resources/lib/punctuation.js resources/lib/abbrev.js resources/lib/defaults.js resources/lib/i18n.js resources/lib/templates.js resources/lib/section.js resources/lib/social.js resources/lib/toc.js resources/lib/util.js resources/lib/index.js resources/test/index.js && standard resources/lib/anchor.js resources/lib/build.js resources/lib/collapse.js resources/lib/markdown.js resources/lib/compile.js resources/lib/figure.js resources/lib/punctuation.js resources/lib/section.js resources/lib/social.js resources/lib/abbrev.js resources/lib/defaults.js resources/lib/i18n.js resources/lib/templates.js resources/lib/toc.js resources/lib/util.js resources/lib/index.js resources/test/index.js && markdownlint index.md
scripts.commit: git --no-pager status && git --no-pager diff && git commit -a -m "Updated `git status | sed -n '/modified:/ {s/^[[:space:]]*modified:[[:space:]]*//;s/\.txt$//;s/\.md$//;s/\.html$//;s/\/index$//;p;q;}'`"
scripts.amend: git --no-pager status && git --no-pager diff && git commit -a --amend --no-edit
scripts.amend-html: npm run build && npm run amend
scripts.build-amend: npm run rebuild && npm run amend
scripts.reword: git --no-pager status && git --no-pager diff && git commit -a --amend
scripts.reset!: npm run reset && npm run clear
scripts.push: git --no-pager status && git pull --rebase && git push
scripts.docx: for f in **/index.txt; do (cd "${f%index.txt}" && pwd && pandoc -S -f markdown -t docx -o "index.docx" "index.txt"); done
